channel.title: Actions on Suntimes
channel.description: Recent content in Actions on Suntimes

item.title: Add Actions
item.description: Common Intents Intents and Intent Filters (docs) To add an action… create an Intent by declaring: Intent (leave fields empty for an implicit intent) Action An action string. e.g. android.intent.action.ACTION_VIEW Class A fully qualified class name (case-sensitive). This must be a complete definition that includes both the package and class name. The class is required for explicit intents - leave it blank to allow the system to decide which class to launch.
